doc.field: This series includes various photographs from Marion Nestle's professional life. It is comprised of head shots as well as photographs from the Surgeon General's Report event in July 1988, a Proctor & Gamble Press Conference in October 1988, Mexico City in 1997, a photo shoot with Claudia Schiffer for Self Magazine in February 1999, "Career Day" events from Spring 1995 and November 1996, construction of the kitchen at the Education Building on 35 W. 4th Street, and a graduation party from May 1998. The series also contains the negatives of some of these photographs as well as negatives from photographs not included in the series.
